metadata.synopsis: Ten-year-old Zoran (Dimitrije Vojnov) leads a cramped life in 1950s Yugoslavia with his mother, Majka (Anica Dobra), his father, Otac (Predrag Manojlovic), and several other guests huddled in a small living space. To escape, Zoran eats prodigiously and worships Yugoslav leader Josip Broz Tito (Voja Brajovic), so much so that he wants to know all about the man. Zoran gets to go on a guided historical tour of Yugoslavia, and he then learns that his hero might not be the great man he imagined.
